description:
Onapsis provides the most comprehensive solutions for securing SAP and Oracle enterprise applications.
As the leading experts in SAP and Oracle cyber-security, Onapsis enables security and audit teams to have visibility, confidence, and control of advanced threats, cyber-risks and compliance gaps that exist within their enterprise applications.
Onapsis solutions include the Onapsis Security Platform, which is the most widely-used SAP-certified cyber-security solution in the market.
